key: Manga Translator is an intelligent workflow tool that automatically translates manga pages and books from one language to another. Whether you're a manga enthusiast who wants to read content in your preferred language, or you need to translate manga for accessibility purposes, this tool makes the process simple and efficient.
simple-test-flow-to-verify-manga-transla: Simple test flow to verify manga translation functionality
translate-a-set-of-images-as-a-manga-boo: Translate a set of images as a manga book
image-file-path-array-to-be-translated: Image file path array to be translated
the-directory-path-where-the-translated-: The directory path where the translated manga pages (image files) are saved. If not filled in, a special address will be set.
the-source-language-of-the-image-if-set-: The source language of the image, if set to auto, it will be automatically recognized
whether-to-use-hardware-acceleration-cud: Whether to use hardware acceleration (CUDA) to recognize images, otherwise only use the CPU
array-of-image-file-path-for-each-page-o: Array of image file path for each page of the manga after translation
the-folder-path-where-the-translated-man: The folder path where the translated manga page images are saved
the-binary-content-of-the-image-to-be-tr: The binary content of the image to be translated
the-source-language-of-the-image-if-set-: The source language of the image, if set to auto, it will be automatically recognized
whether-to-use-hardware-acceleration-cud: Whether to use hardware acceleration (CUDA) to recognize images, otherwise only use the CPU
extension-indicating-the-type-of-transla: Extension indicating the type of translated image
the-manga-book-file-path-to-be-translate: the manga book file path to be translated
the-file-path-where-the-manga-book-will-: The file path where the manga book will be saved after translation. The extension will determine the format of the translated manga book. If not filled in, a special path will be specified, and the extension will be the same as the original book file (but *.cbr will be changed to *.cbz).
the-source-language-of-the-manga-book-if: The source language of the manga book, if set to auto, it will be automatically recognized
whether-to-use-hardware-acceleration-cud: Whether to use hardware acceleration (CUDA) to recognize images, otherwise only use the CPU
the-file-path-where-the-manga-book-will-: The file path where the manga book will be saved after translation
batch-translate-manga-book-files-in-a-fo: Batch translate manga book files in a folder
the-searched-folder-path-all-manga-files: The searched folder path, all manga files inside will be translated
the-translated-manga-files-will-be-saved: The translated manga files will be saved in this folder. If you do not fill in this field, specify a specific folder.
the-source-language-of-the-image-if-set-: The source language of the image, if set to auto, it will be automatically recognized
whether-to-use-hardware-acceleration-cud: Whether to use hardware acceleration (CUDA) to recognize images, otherwise only use the CPU
which-formats-of-manga-files-to-translat: Which formats of manga files to translate (multiple selections), unselected formats will be ignored.
the-translated-manga-files-will-be-saved: The translated manga files will be saved in this folde
